Blog.post: Ermmm....today...michelle and i went to see pn kong...for the food and drinkzz...after the pj lesson...then...after reccess i went to the upper hall for the rehearsel for the anugerah thingy...i guess there's something wrong with me..i just got nervous and blur...and a teacher came to me...asking me to be more serious...hmm...maybe...i walk too fast...haha...pif...forget bout it...anyway...after those rehearsal stuff..i went to the koperasi to be interviewed by some students...like ming yuet..winnie..li ming...and etc etc..it's not like those very very extremely formal kind of interview...coz..i laugh and smile all the way thru it...they're funny and friendly..anyhow...i got to answer the questions smoothly...and i just couldn't answer one particular question...what's the latest stock in the koperasi?wah la..i like...huh?got new stuff meh?...then someone there was like asking why got new stuff i oso duno?then the other gurl say..that book lo...then i was like..ooOoo...that book lo..then winnie was like asking...except for that book...then i was like...i duno lo~ selamba only...lolzzz..that's all i guess...hmm...too long already..gotta stop here~ ^^
Currently listening to Avril's song while chit chattin with friends and also doing my modern maths homework >.
siGh...i duno y i kept on sighing lately...aHhh..dont ask me..i do not know why...AhHhh...help me..!knock some sense out of me!...>.

went out today...wanted to watch King Arthur at 10.50 am but....but...no more tickets!!!ARgH...anyway...bee and i walked around...play some games in capcom...trying to kill time...then cmy called me and bee and i followed cmy and jin sheng to mph..etc etc...janji got place to go lor~hEe~not long later...siew loong came...we then watched mean girls at 3.40pm...quite nice...not bad la~ then walked and walked and walked...then...go back home lo...like usual loo...nothing special...so...nothing to write anymore...if got anything special then only i will...type and post another one...~ c u guys...and yea..gurlz~

My day did not start perfectly...suddenly got this spotcheck...and i forgotten to take my liquid out of my pencil case...there goes another 10 dimerits..Argh!...then later...we were told that we could not leave our books in the desk...as in...leave the books overnight...*duh...we knew bout it long,long time ago* but...during assembly..we just took out our bags and left the books in our desks...eARly MorNinG!...pHew...luckily we weren't given 15 dimerits for that...just another warning...i guess i must thank god eh?if not...10 dimerits + 15 dimerits=25 dimerits...aHhh...then i would be a professional toilet washer after my detention duty...=p pHEwww...luckily...or not...another innocent Saturday of mine will be wasted...HEe~* sigh...i miss my liquid..HhehheheHEhe ^^ duno ler...kind of frustrated today...i dont even know why am i frustrated...maybe the 10 dimerits did bother me...hmPh!talking about luck...if only...i checked my pencil case the day before...if only...wateva...haihzzz...why am i so unlucky lately...well anyway...if any of u got the time...and got nothin better to do...plz go to urlLink www.winglin.net/fanfic/Melz ...well...1st warning...kind of boring i think...anyway...that was the site i wrote about a stupid story...and i ended it...last year...got 100 over chapters..maybe i nag too much...anyway...til here today~ =)
Sigh...just a few days...and a few things had changed...aiyo...cant put my bag in the class like last time when i reached school >. .

Okay..I'm very blur now...lolz...i read my friends' blogs..and kind of got the feelings to start mine too...hEe~* anyway..just got back from singapore...went there for my sis's conmercement...kinda bored le...nothing to do there...>.

Wah...during pj period..we kinda play this game..hmm..issit call baseball?no idea..anyway...my friend hit this ball...n the ball went to my another friend..the ball went for her left eye...n her specs broke into two...n she was brought to see the doc...phew..luckily nothing bad happened to her...i was so shocked...because...i was...standing behind her...if it was not for her...i will be the one got hit...geez...i guess i must thank her..phEW

haihz...i had found out that i had forgotten to tell my aunty that im staying back today...i guess she must had been thinking i will go to her house today...i..felt...very...bad...haihz.........not in mood...haihz........................

hMm...yesterday[Sunday] i went out with bee...yea...we're les...=p lolz..jk oni...hmmm...we watch i,robot at 11..after we got out...we accidentally met lip chung..he was alone...so cham...then bee and i went to eat at dave's deli..and was followed by lip chung..we chat and chat and chat for some time...then i needed to go to bead's bar to make some stuff for pey zhi for the farewell's party..hmm...then lip chung got to go already.. T.T after that...bee and i went to capcom to play ddr and dj..next we went to watch another movie;3 of a kind at 2.25...it was funny...obviously..with lau ching wan and mirriam yeong inside...hmm..oh well..enough about that i suppose...let's talk about today...after school...>

ok..mum is not in..went to kl..so...no dinner...dad,brota and i went out to this restaurant..dont even remember its name..anyway..i wore a yellow tshirt and so..coincidence...the table's cloth in that restaurant..is... YELLOW !!! how embarrasing..just imagine..it's like..my shirt..made from that cloth...gosh..then i saw this guy...same tuition with my ex tuition fiz...well i duno his name..lalala..guess he's from anderson..hmm...the...laukz...are...not...so nice...especially..when u found a...hair...in one of the dishes...omg...i lost my appetite..feeling like....puking...then the carrot-milk juice...ew...i think i shall blacklist this restaurant..EWwwWWwwWWw...X!

well...the title says it all...im...terribly,extremely sad!....sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad sad **** i hate you!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

currently not in mood..anyway...a brief update..hmm..well..chee ching and i managed to go for 2 meetings...well..actually..we went for the koperasi meetin for..a few minutes..and then asked mr lau's permission to go for the ranger's meeting...wah la..i heard the koperasi meeting..is..sienz..n...talk bout nonsense..as in the same thing..over n over n over n over n over n over n over again...hmm...then the add mathz exam...hmmm..ok la...everytime i mentioned ok..aiyo...the results that will come back...is very disappointing..haihz..duno la..then..fiz...dunwanna talk bout it already...haihz haihz haihz...anyway...i have made up my mind..not gonna log in ro so much already..gonna try to reduce it..ro always make me no mood..and i dunwan to spoil my day cause of some stupid and idiotic stuff in it..

just wana update about yesterday's night..hehe..well..sook fun and i reached da tuition centre at 740pm...then...we walked around finding for stuff to be bought as souvenirs..at last...we..actually walked to jusco from pusat tuition lee...>

so...i got a damn terrible marks for my mod mathz..haihz..currently listening to maksim's rhapsody on a theme of paganini..haihzz..okie..today there's this audition for the installation day..but i kinda lucky coz i got to skip it..and yea..the latin dance is in..yEah!..hmm..other than that..i cant really remember anything already...hmm..and yea..my chem exam will be postponed to next tuesday..talk about luck..i nearly went in front of the class and hug the teacher...> O !! okok this morning at 4am..suddenly *dut dut* then..1 msg received..and wah...no more outgoing calls for me!!...pif... T.T

pHew..long time didn't update my blog adi...hmm..anyway..been quite busy this week...with mod mathz exam to bio exam...then..there's this preparation for rangers enrolment..well..it went smoothly..and..im OFFICIALLY a ranger!!WHEe~~* not only me of course~ hehehe...on the same day...there's 7th coy n 8th coy camp..i went home after enrolment and then at around 5sumthing i went to school...well...my friends who stayed told me that alot of form 1s cried durin inspection >
